meanings.sent1: The treadler walked carefully along the narrow path.
meanings.sent2: The hiker was a skilled treadler, navigating the rocky terrain effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The treadler tip-toed around the sleeping cat to avoid waking it up.
meanings.sent4: In the dance of life, each person is a treadler on their own unique path.
meanings.sent5: The treadler left footprints in the fresh snow, marking their journey.

meanings.definition: A person who operates a treadle, especially on a sewing machine.
meanings.sent1: The treadler pressed the pedal to make the sewing machine run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother was a skilled treadler, creating beautiful quilts with her sewing machine.
meanings.sent3: The treadler accidentally sewed a button onto their sleeve instead of the shirt.
meanings.sent4: The treadler's foot moved rhythmically, like a musician playing a pedal instrument.
meanings.sent5: With each press of the treadler, the needle danced across the fabric, stitching a story.
